item.title: How to Use Twillio for SMS
item.description: With CRM software being high in demand, there is always a need to keep in touch with the end user. Using Twillio, you can easily register new virtual phone numbers to send and recieve text messages and voice calls. Phone Number Registration Imagine giving each user their own phone number. Phone number registration is simple and only costs $1 a month. To register a phone number, search for an available one by area code.
